input_text:
Job Title: Journeyman Electrician

Location: Upper Marlboro, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description 

The journeyman electrician will be responsible for supporting the master electrician as well as a few other internal employees through their daily installs/repairs. KCI has developed an electrical practice to couple with their communications practice. They have continued to dominate in the communications market, and almost all of their electrical work that must be done within the telecomm installs has been outsourced until the past few years. The electrical team has partnered heavy with Wireless Carriers for BESS (Battery Energy Safety Storage) and Generator installs at cell sites. They are also gaining a ton of work within the EV space with rising initiatives and Autonomous Vehicles on the horizon. Some of the main clients that this electrician will be supporting are on the wireless side of the house not limited to TMOBILE, Verizon, AWS, and most recently a ton of EV (Electrical Vehicle) support at various dealerships and commercial properties. Apprentice school programs are about 4 years (Residential, Commercial, Motor Control, and Code). 600 volts or less, 120-208 (3 Phase Transformers), 120-240 (1 phase transformer). Open to candidates that are at the tail end of the apprentice program. EV work is a little bigger, 1600 Amp, 2500 AMP, 208. Large switch gear. Putting in for Charging Stations. They will be working to support Generator deployments for the wireless group, Service work, upgrades, Cabinet Installs, basic electrical piping and wiring, etc. Must have a MD Journeyman license or in process of getting one.

 Skills 

conduit, telecommunications, Coax, Fiber, generator, Conduit Bending, Power & Utilities, Low Voltage, Electric Power

 Top Skills Details 

conduit,telecommunications,Coax,Fiber,generator,Conduit Bending,Power & Utilities,Low Voltage,Electric Power

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Work ethic, Reliable, and Flexible. ability to perform install and swaps on generators. Knowledge of DC power systems. Very communicative and self-sufficient

 Experience Level 

Intermediate Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Journeyman Electrician
soft_skills: ability to perform install and swaps on generators
job_responsibilities: Supporting the master electrician and internal employees
Supporting clients in the wireless sector such as TMOBILE, Verizon, AWS
Supporting clients in the EV space
